question: You are planning to go and study English at a school overseas. You would like some information about their courses.Write a letter to the school. In your letterask about the schoolsay what kind of accommodation you wantmention any special requests you have (for example diet).
text: I am writing this letter to enquire about the English literature course offered by your prestigious institution for foreign students.

Perhaps, I had already finished my bachelor's in English and consequently, I want to further enhance my knowledge of the language. I wanted to request  detailed information about the course. I am specifically looking for the Advanced Studies program which is going to start next December.

In addition, I  want to apply for a hostel room as I am an international student and had never been to England. It would reduce the hassle of finding a place to stay, beforehand. Moreover, I would prefer  shared accommodation with an Asian because most of our culture is the same and it would be economical.

I must inform you that I am allergic to gluten, could you please confirm for me if my special diet requests can be met by the hostel canteen? and if not, whether I will be allowed access to a kitchen so that I can prepare my own food?
I look forward to your reply and would really appreciate your guidance,
